mapper.sql: sample_id, station_name, station_num, to_char (start_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD" "HH24:MI:SS') as start_dt, to_char (mean_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD" "HH24:MI:SS') as mean_dt, to_char (end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD" "HH24:MI:SS') as end_dt, time_zone, usgs_data_lead, sample_method, sample_location, sampler_name, nozzle, num_verticals, transits_each_vertical, cableway_station_loc, water_depth, elevation_above_bed, sampling_duration, pump_sampler, pump_carousel_num, dataset_complete, cross_sect_calib_req, use_for_load_calc, notes, air_temp, water_temp, spec_cond, tds, silt_clay_color, conc_laboratory, grain_size_laboratory, lab_notes, lab_method, sed_conc_xs, silt_clay_conc_xs, sand_conc_xs, sand_d16_xs, sand_d50_xs, sand_d84_xs, sand_pct_lt_074_xs, sand_pct_lt_088_xs, sand_pct_lt_105_xs, sand_pct_lt_125_xs, sand_pct_lt_149_xs, sand_pct_lt_177_xs, sand_pct_lt_210_xs, sand_pct_lt_250_xs, sand_pct_lt_297_xs, sand_pct_lt_354_xs, sand_pct_lt_420_xs, sand_pct_lt_500_xs, sand_pct_lt_595_xs, sand_pct_lt_707_xs, sand_pct_lt_841_xs, sand_pct_lt_1000_xs, sample_mass, sediment_mass, mass_le_63, mass_gt_63, conc_le_63, conc_gt_63, sed_conc_lab, silt_clay_conc_lab, sand_conc_lab, sand_d16_lab, sand_d50_lab, sand_d84_lab, sand_pct_lt_074_lab, sand_pct_lt_088_lab, sand_pct_lt_105_lab, sand_pct_lt_125_lab, sand_pct_lt_149_lab, sand_pct_lt_177_lab, sand_pct_lt_210_lab, sand_pct_lt_250_lab, sand_pct_lt_297_lab, sand_pct_lt_354_lab, sand_pct_lt_420_lab, sand_pct_lt_500_lab, sand_pct_lt_595_lab, sand_pct_lt_707_lab, sand_pct_lt_841_lab, sand_pct_lt_1000_lab, silt_clay_field_95er, sand_field_95er, sand_d50_field_95er, silt_clay_lab_bias_cor, silt_clay_lab_95er, sand_lab_95er, sand_d50_lab_95er, silt_clay_tot_95er, sand_tot_95er, sand_d50_tot_95er, sed_tot_95er
mapper.select:
SELECT
from (select s.sample_id, si.name station_name, coalesce(si.nwis_site_no, si.short_name) station_num, s.start_date - concat(n.offset_from_mst/24, 'hours')::interval as start_dt, s.average_date - concat(n.offset_from_mst/24, 'hours')::interval as mean_dt, s.end_date - concat(n.offset_from_mst/24, 'hours')::interval as end_dt, case n.offset_from_mst when 0 then 'MST' when -1 then 'CST' end time_zone, d.name usgs_data_lead, sm.sample_method, sub.name sample_location, sa.sampler_name, s.nozzle, s.num_verticals, s.transits_each_vertical, s.cableway_station_loc, s.water_depth, s.elevation_above_bed, s.sampling_duration, s.pump_sampler, s.pump_carousel_num, s.dataset_complete, s.cross_sect_calib_req, s.use_for_load_calc, s.serve, s.notes, f.fines_color silt_clay_color, lc.code conc_laboratory, gs.code grain_size_laboratory, s.lab_notes, lm.lab_method, r.spec_cond, r.air_temp, r.water_temp, r.sed_conc_lab, r.silt_clay_conc_lab, r.sand_conc_lab, r.sample_mass, r.sediment_mass, r.mass_le_63, r.mass_gt_63, r.conc_le_63, r.conc_gt_63, r.tds, r.sand_d16_lab, r.sand_d50_lab, r.sand_d84_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_074_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_088_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_105_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_125_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_149_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_177_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_210_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_250_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_297_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_354_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_420_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_500_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_595_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_707_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_841_lab, r.sand_pct_lt_1000_lab, r.sed_conc_xs, r.silt_clay_conc_xs, r.sand_conc_xs, r.sand_d16_xs, r.sand_d50_xs, r.sand_d84_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_074_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_088_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_105_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_125_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_149_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_177_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_210_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_250_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_297_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_354_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_420_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_500_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_595_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_707_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_841_xs, r.sand_pct_lt_1000_xs, rs.silt_clay_field_95er, rs.sand_field_95er, rs.sand_d50_field_95er, rs.silt_clay_lab_bias_cor, rs.silt_clay_lab_95er, rs.sand_lab_95er, rs.sand_d50_lab_95er, rs.silt_clay_tot_95er, rs.sand_tot_95er, rs.sand_d50_tot_95er, rs.sed_tot_95er from ( select sample_id, AVG(case when group_id = 110 then suspsed_value else null end) spec_cond, AVG(case when group_id = 112 then suspsed_value else null end) air_temp, AVG(case when group_id = 113 then suspsed_value else null end) water_temp, AVG(case when group_id = 119 then suspsed_value else null end) sed_conc_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 63 then suspsed_value else null end) silt_clay_conc_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 64 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_conc_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 84 then suspsed_value else null end) sample_mass, AVG(case when group_id = 120 then suspsed_value else null end) sediment_mass, AVG(case when group_id = 85 then suspsed_value else null end) mass_le_63, AVG(case when group_id = 86 then suspsed_value else null end) mass_gt_63, AVG(case when group_id = 87 then suspsed_value else null end) conc_le_63, AVG(case when group_id = 88 then suspsed_value else null end) conc_gt_63, AVG(case when group_id = 111 then suspsed_value else null end) tds, AVG(case when group_id = 65 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_d16_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 66 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_d50_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 67 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_d84_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 68 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_074_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 69 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_088_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 70 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_105_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 71 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_125_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 72 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_149_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 73 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_177_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 74 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_210_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 75 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_250_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 76 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_297_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 77 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_354_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 78 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_420_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 79 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_500_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 80 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_595_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 81 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_707_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 82 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_841_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 83 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_1000_lab, AVG(case when group_id = 120 then suspsed_value else null end) sed_conc_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 89 then suspsed_value else null end) silt_clay_conc_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 90 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_conc_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 91 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_d16_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 92 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_d50_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 93 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_d84_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 94 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_074_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 95 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_088_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 96 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_105_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 97 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_125_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 98 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_149_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 99 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_177_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 100 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_210_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 101 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_250_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 102 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_297_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 103 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_354_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 104 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_420_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 105 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_500_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 106 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_595_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 107 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_707_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 108 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_841_xs, AVG(case when group_id = 109 then suspsed_value else null end) sand_pct_lt_1000_xs from result_star group by sample_id ) as r left join sample_star s on r.sample_id = s.sample_id join site_star si on s.site_id = si.site_id join network n on si.network_name = n.network_nm left join data_lead_star d on d.data_lead_id = s.data_lead_id left join sample_method_star sm on sm.sample_method_id = s.sample_method_id left join subsite_star sub on sub.subsite_id = s.subsite_id left join sampler_star sa on sa.sampler_id = s.sampler_id left join fines_color_star f on f.fines_color_id = s.fines_color_id left join laboratory_star lc on lc.laboratory_id = s.concentration_lab_id left join laboratory_star gs on gs.laboratory_id = s.grain_size_lab_id left join lab_method_star lm on lm.lab_method_id = s.lab_method_id left join ( select r.sample_id, max ( case when r.group_id = 89 then r.field_95conf else null end) silt_clay_field_95er, max ( case when r.group_id = 90 then r.field_95conf else null end) sand_field_95er, max ( case when r.group_id = 92 then r.field_95conf else null end) sand_d50_field_95er, max ( case when r.group_id = 89 then r.bias_correction else null end) silt_clay_lab_bias_cor, max ( case when r.group_id = 89 then r.lab_95conf else null end) silt_clay_lab_95er, max ( case when r.group_id = 90 then r.lab_95conf else null end) sand_lab_95er, max ( case when r.group_id = 92 then r.lab_95conf else null end) sand_d50_lab_95er, max ( case when r.group_id = 89 then r.total_95conf else null end) silt_clay_tot_95er, max ( case when r.group_id = 90 then r.total_95conf else null end) sand_tot_95er, max ( case when r.group_id = 92 then r.total_95conf else null end) sand_d50_tot_95er, max ( case when r.group_id = 121 then r.total_95conf else null end) sed_tot_95er from result_star r group by r.sample_id ) rs on rs.sample_id = s.sample_id where s.serve = 'YES' ) t_a_inner
station_num = #{site}
and start_dt >= to_date (#{beginDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') and start_dt <= to_date (#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS')
order by start_dt, sample_id
